commitCanvas

The interactive tool that helps you create art within your own GitHub contribution graph


The below graph is an imitation of the GitHub contribution graph only better. You can draw in this one!!

Fill the graph with art and either:

generate a schedule that details your future commits to display the art on your GitHub profile!

OR

download an all in one Git repository which will display the art after uploading it to your GitHub profile!
